name: Checks class existence in class path
description: Allows to check, whether the given class is available in the system class path. Can be helpful for debugging situations, when the system cannot find some component.

out_ports.name: is_existing_class
out_ports.hint: Boolean value: true if the specified class found, false if not.

controls.caption: Class name
controls.name: className
controls.description: Full exact name of Java class. It it is found in the current Java class path, "is_existing_class" output will contain true, in other case it will be false.
